name: Scary Halloween Voice Changer – Free Funny Sound.s
name_original: Scary Halloween Voice Changer – Free Funny Sound.s
description:
Spooky days have come! How do you feel about having another awesome app filled with scary details? If you want to have some hilarious time with your friends and family members, “Scary Halloween Voice Changer – Free Funny Sound.s” is going to make your wishes come true! Download this entertaining app for kids and adults even today and have fun using this great app whenever you like! Find out how scary or funny you may sound! Change your voice and the voice of your friends in the easiest possible way!

- Tap to record voices for free and transform it!
- Add one of a wide range of scary sounds effects!
- Additional custom voice changing!
- Record, easily edit, name and save your recording file
- Directly share them with your friends via all social networks!
- Turn the modified sounds into ringtones or SMS sounds!
- In-app purchases and the option to restore purchases!

Dedicate your life to the moments of fun and entertainment! With amazing free apps that make you laugh, like this one, you can live happier life and always smile! Just tap to record your voice and sounds for free and make fun of what you have recorded! Use the recorded sounds in a lot of fun ways and always live for laughter! And all that for free! Don't hesitate to set your favorite recorded sounds as phone ringtones so that you can always have amazing time every time a particular person calls or texts you!

Download this free awesome app and don't be afraid to show the whole world how cool you are! Instill the best life features into yourself and do things that make you happy! If one of those things is having fun while changing your regular voice to the scary one, grab our free app and test it right now! Record your voice or the voice of your friends and then transform it with the help of the awesome sound effects. Set the newly formed sounds as phone ringtones and have fun with every new incoming call or text message you receive!
